root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 3-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: 3.1 By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality rate to less than 70 deaths per 100,000 live births
3.1 At√© 2030, reduzir a taxa de mortalidade materna global para menos de 70 mortes por 100.000 nascidos vivos
